' los . angeles police sergeant enrique mendoza confirmed the arrest but . would n't give details about the incident or the alleged victim . the governor 's ball is the official . oscar party and is held above the film award show 's venue , the hollywood . & highland theatre . she . posted bail of $ 20,000 early on monday morning . an academy of motion . arts and sciences spokesman did not immediately comment . the incident is not her first issue at . an oscars after party . she tried to get into a vanity fair party by . sneaking in behind jennifer aniston in 2006 . but she was escorted out by four guards when spotted by security . young said of the incident in a recent . interview : ` it was degrading . but when you have nothing to lose , it 's . really not that big of a deal .
